description: The joy of a perfectly sweet and creamy hot buttered rum is hard to beat, but what about whiskey? Choose from robust&nbsp;bourbon or rye for an even more intense flavor profile. Mix with some traditional spices like nutmeg and allspice to make this drink your own!
